Title: Lady Macbeth
Writer: Nikolai Leskov (based on Lady Macbeth of Mtsensk), Alice Birch
Actors: Florence Pugh, Cosmo Jarvis, Paul Hilton, Naomi Ackie
Plot: In 19th-century rural England, a young bride who has been sold into marriage discovers an unstoppable desire within herself as she enters into an affair with a worker on her estate.
Awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 18 wins & 39 nominations.
